html:
And upon all the high mountains, and upon all the hills that are lifted up, (Isaiah 2:14.)

And upon all the high mountains, and upon all the hills, and upon all the nations which are lifted up, and upon every people; (2 Ne. 12:14.)

The 2 Nephi reading retains two phrases, "upon all the nations" and "upon every people," more clearly showing the universal nature of the Lord's coming in glory.
